pullrequest.title: Implement an option to respect enviroment flags

content.raw:
I tried the following:
~~~
$ cmake .. -DUSE_UPSTREAM_CFLAGS:Bool=False
$ make VERBOSE=1
...
cd /home/scpeters/ws/sdformat/src/sdformat/build/src && /usr/lib/ccache/c++  \
 -Dsdformat_EXPORTS -O3 -DNDEBUG \
 -Wall -Wextra -Wno-long-long -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wno-unused-value -Wfloat-equal -Wshadow   -Winit-self -Wswitch-default -Wmissing-include-dirs -pedantic \
 -O3 -DNDEBUG -fPIC \
 -I/home/scpeters/ws/sdformat/src/sdformat/test/gtest/include -I/home/scpeters/ws/sdformat/src/sdformat/include -I/home/scpeters/ws/sdformat/src/sdformat/build -I/home/scpeters/ws/sdformat/src/sdformat/build/include -I/home/scpeters/ws/sdformat/src/sdformat/src/urdf \
 -fPIC -o CMakeFiles/sdformat.dir/Assert.cc.o \
 -c /home/scpeters/ws/sdformat/src/sdformat/src/Assert.cc
~~~
Is that cmake option supposed to disable all flags? It looks like it's still putting `Relase` type flags (`-O3 -DNDEBUG`).
